title: Bright and beautiful 1 bed / 1 bath! Don't wait to call us home!
posting_body: ['Come home to a great community - IMT Dayton Station!', 'Address:', '3645 S Dallas St', 'Aurora, CO 80014', 'Beds:', '1  /', 'Baths:', '1 /', 'Size:', '786 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent:', '$1710', '**Walk-ins welcome & choose from 3 tour options.', '**', 'At IMT Dayton Station Apartments in Aurora, CO, location is everything.', 'We are just steps away from the Commuter RTD Light Rail and Denver Tech Center, and just 20 minutes to DIA as well as easy access to I-225 and I-25.', "Our one, two and three-bedroom apartments and townhomes for rent feature 9' ceilings, spacious closets, and in-home washer/dryer.", 'Premium apartments are available with stainless steel appliances, designer backsplash, and granite counters.', 'Take a Virtual Tour of Our Property Today!', '<URL>',
